sys_element_mapping.value:
Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your recent International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name from Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Departure date through Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Return date has been denied. You are not allowed to request more than three International trips within a two-month period. 

If you have further questions, please speak to your direct supervisor.

Thank you.

Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your recent International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name from Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Departure date through Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Return date has been denied. You are not allowed to rquest more than three International trips within a two-month period. 

If you have further questions, please speak to your direct supervisor.

Thank you.
Your Travel Request to {{Created_1.current.destination.name}} has been denied
Your Travel Request to {{Created_1.current.destination.name}} has been denied

sys_variable_value.value: Your International Travel Request has been Nationally Approved!
Your International Travel Request has been Nationally Approved!

sys_element_mapping.value:
Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name has been Approved by a National Approver. 

Your travel is scheduled for Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Departure date through Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Return date.

Enjoy your trip!

Thanks.

Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name has been Approved by a National Approver. 

Your travel is scheduled for Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Departure date through Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Return date.

Enjoy your trip!

Thanks.

sys_variable_value.value: Your International Travel Request has been Denied.
Your International Travel Request has been Denied.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name has been Denied by a National Approver.

If you have questions regarding this decision, please speak with your direct supervisor.

Thanks.

Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name has been Denied by a National Approver.

If you have questions regarding this decision, please speak with your direct supervisor.

Thanks.

sys_variable_value.value: Your International Travel Request has been Regionally Approved!
Your International Travel Request has been Regionally Approved!

sys_element_mapping.value:
Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name has been Approved by a Regional Approver. Your request will now be forwarded to a National Approver. You will receive the decision via email.

Thanks.

Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name has been Approved by a Regional Approver. Your request will now be forwarded to a National Approver. You will receive the decision via email.

Thanks.

sys_variable_value.value: Your International Travel Request has been Denied.
Your International Travel Request has been Denied.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name has been Denied by a Regional Approver. 

If you have any questions about this decision, please speak with your direct supervisor.

Thanks.

Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name has been Denied by a Regional Approver. 

If you have any questions about this decision, please speak with your direct supervisor.

Thanks.

sys_variable_value.value: Your International Travel Request has been Nationally Approved!

sys_element_mapping.value:
Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name has been Approved by a National Approver. 

Your travel is scheduled for Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Departure date through Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Return date.

Enjoy your trip!

Thanks.

sys_variable_value.value: Your International Travel Request has been Denied.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name has been Denied by a Regional Approver. 

If you have any questions about this decision, please speak with your direct supervisor.

Thanks.

sys_variable_value.value: Your International Travel Request has been Denied.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name has been Denied by a National Approver.

If you have questions regarding this decision, please speak with your direct supervisor.

Thanks.

Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your recent International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name from Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Departure date through Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Return date has been denied. You are not allowed to request more than three International trips within a two-month period. 

If you have further questions, please speak to your direct supervisor.

Thank you.
Your Travel Request to {{Created_1.current.destination.name}} has been denied

sys_variable_value.value: Your International Travel Request has been Regionally Approved!

sys_element_mapping.value:
Greetings Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Your International Travel Request to Trigger➛Travel Requests Record➛Destination➛Name has been Approved by a Regional Approver. Your request will now be forwarded to a National Approver. You will receive the decision via email.

Thanks.
